snippet.title: Death Race Exidy 1976
snippet.description:
Death Race Exidy 1976
This was THE first game that got me into gaming. The fantasy of being the grim reaper and capturing lives was exceptionally awesome.  The digital purr of the engine.  The scream of the capture. Very memorable to me.  Back in the mid to late 70's it was cool. But there was more ... It was controversial, which brought its awesomeness level to near myth like levels.
